results.name: Expansion of the inverse of the 16th cyclotomic polynomial.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1).
Index to sequences related to inverse of cyclotomic polynomials
formula: a(n)=(floor((n+8)/8)-floor((n+7)/8))*(-1)^floor(n/8). |a(n)| is the characteristic function of numbers that are multiples of 8. |a(n)|=floor(n/8)-floor((n-1)/8). - _Boris Putievskiy_, May 08 2013
results.author: _Simon Plouffe_
